articles.author: Kenneth Kiesnoski
articles.title: Eager to travel, Americans book Sun Belt beach, city stays as pandemic fades - CNBC
articles.description: Among the most eager travelers in the world, Americans are researching and booking summer getaways to sunny domestic spots that are reopening.
articles.content:
Interest in travel is picking up as the pandemic winds down, and cooped-up Americans are itching to hit the road again, two recent surveys have found.
Travelers are thinking about booking trips to w… [+4116 chars]
